about_the_game:
Get ready for an epic adventure in our upcoming Steam game, where you'll investigate a string of sinister attacks on a small farming village and uncover a much deeper conspiracy. As you journey through our immersive world, you'll encounter a variety of quirky and sometimes strange characters, battle hordes of enemies, and ultimately save the kingdom from the forces of darkness.

Our game features a wide range of challenging enemies, each with their own unique buffs and spells that will test your skills and strategy. But fear not, as you progress, you'll be able to develop your character with a variety of stats and abilities to help you become stronger and more powerful.

Choose from a variety of character classes, including the cunning and agile Barbarian, the brutal and strong Orc or the magical and intelligent Cultist. Each class has its own set of spells and abilities, allowing you to mix and match to create the perfect combination for your playstyle.

Our game boasts over 50 different buffs and abilities, more than 100 items to collect and experiment with, and a crafting system by crafting tables placed around the world that allows you to craft a variety of items based on recipes. With over 60 different weapons and shields, as well as a variety of crafting items, buff items, and elixirs, there is no shortage of ways to progress in the game.

content_descriptors.notes: The game has somewhat mild violence and gore visible from a distance. Gorey sounds and frightening ambience and ritualistic themes. The game is however intended for most age categories.
